text: 3.4: Fi 3.19; 2 Pi 2.13; Zu 1.4; 1.19Mbe tɨvi mbatɨgir wari won kɨvntogira muunga, mbe wari won ndɨkndɨgi mbatɨgira zɨn ŋgɨrga. Mbe kha ndɨkndɨgar muunga, mbe nduarira gumgir ruu ma. Mbe guigira kha nuianan mbarkɨrga tɨvi, mbe ntan ndikndigirga, mbe nta vuzvugɨp, mbe Fhe Bakɨme vuzvugirga fhu.
